extracted_information: This repository focuses on Timeseries Forecasting using various Deep Learning models. The project utilizes a dataset comprising 7-year daily closing prices of major tech stocks: Facebook (META), Amazon (AMZN), Apple (AAPL), Netflix (NFLX), and Google (GOOG). The dataset is split into 80% for training and 20% for testing. The primary target variable for forecasting is the 'Closing Price'. Model accuracy is evaluated using RMSE (Root Mean Squared Error) and MAPE (Mean Absolute Percentage Error).

specifications.dataset_source: 7-year daily closing price of stock market prices for Facebook (META), Amazon (AMZN), Apple (AAPL), Netflix (NFLX), and Google (GOOG)

features: Implementation of Feed Forward Neural Network
Implementation of Long Short-Term Memory Framework
Implementation of Gated Recurring Unit Framework
technologies_used: Deep Learning Models (Feed Forward Neural Network, Recurrent Neural Network, Long Short-Term Memory Framework, Gated Recurring Unit Framework, Convolutional Neural Network)
